description.black-white:
On the second turn, the user hits the
target with electrically charged ice.
It may leave the target with paralysis.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
